phrases.original: Every invite that you send promotes a specific event (Bible Talk, Sunday Service, etc.).
phrases.translated: Every invite that you send promotes a specific event (Bible Talk, Sunday Service, etc.).

phrases.original: Choose one or both of the following options:
phrases.translated: Choose one or both of the following options:

phrases.original: Let your friends be responsible for keeping the details of their events up-to-date. You can then invite people to those events. This is a great option if your friend is an evangelist, a Bible Talk Leader, in a different age group, or lives close to a distant area that you plan on visiting.
phrases.translated: Let your friends be responsible for keeping the details of their events up-to-date. You can then invite people to those events. This is a great option if your friend is an evangelist, a Bible Talk Leader, in a different age group, or lives close to a distant area that you plan on visiting.

phrases.original: Customize an event with your own personal writing style. Describe what personally resonates with you. Or lead the way and write the event specifically for the friends that follow you, so they can use it within their invites.
phrases.translated: Customize an event with your own personal writing style. Describe what personally resonates with you. Or lead the way and write the event specifically for the friends that follow you, so they can use it within their invites.
